lines.text:
[to Sonny while he uses his home movie camera]
You never run outta film, do you?

[Girly is visibly upset by the super 8 snuff reel her family is watching]
Girly, come back here and watch the lovely film!
[Girly bites her nails and sits back down to watch the snuff reel]

[Girly watches as Sonny and the other man try to get the man's girlfriend to go down the slide]
Go on!... bitch.
[Sonny nods his head and then grabs the girlfriend's leg, causing her to trip]
[the girlfriend falls several feet to the ground below, breaking neck. The man stares down in shock while Sonny and Girly pick up the girlfriend's veil from her body]

[In a childish voice]
What'd you push her for, Mister?
It's the children! They've found a new friend!
Nasty Nanny is no good! Chop her up for fire wood! When she's dead, boil her head, make it into gingerbread!
And we'll all be taking potshots. At you. And we won't be using cues.
Show Mumsy... you're not a little boy anymore...
New Friend's not stupid... New Friend knows what Mumsy means.
